item.description:
<img src="https://roukaixin.github.io/posts/thumbnail/arch/arch-drive-install.webp" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="安装-nvidia-驱动" class="heading-element"><span>1、安装 NVIDIA 驱动</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-nvidia-%e9%a9%b1%e5%8a%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote><p>安装驱动</p>
</blockquote><p>安装启动之前，先跟新一下 pacman 数据库。更新命令：<code>sudo pacman -Syyu</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装 linux-lts-headers，因为显卡启动需要。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 注意：如果内核是 linux ，不是 linux-lts，那么安装的是 linux-headers</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo pacman -S linux-lts-headers</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装 nvidia 启动，推荐安装 nvidia-dkms ，他是动态安装的。不像其他驱动，如果内核升级，就需要重新安装一次驱动。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo pacman -S nvidia-dkms</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>DRM 内核模式设置</p>
</blockquote><p><strong>这一步可以解决屏幕撕裂问题</strong></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑修改 /etc/default/grub</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /etc/default/grub
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 找到 GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT 这一项在后面加入 nvidia-drm.modeset=1</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230507044757042</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png" alt="image-20230507044757042" srcset="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png?size=small, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507044757042.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20230507044757042</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230506101749305</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png" alt="image-20230506101749305" srcset="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png?size=small, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230506101749305.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20230506101749305</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p><strong>编辑完成之后，重新生成 <code>grub.cfg</code> ，执行 <code>sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg</code></strong></p>
<blockquote><p>添加 initramfs 模块</p>
</blockquote><p>在 <code>/etc/mkinitcpio.conf</code> 中找到 <code>MODULES=</code> 这一行在括号的后面加入<code>nvidia nvidia_modeset nvidia_uvm nvidia_drm</code>。修改之前先备份一下（<code>sudo cp /etc/mkinitcpio.conf /etc/mkinitcpio.conf.back</code>）</p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230507045036585</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png" alt="image-20230507045036585" srcset="assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png?size=small, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/arch-drive-install.assets/image-20230507045036585.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20230507045036585</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<blockquote><p>重新生成 <code>initramfs </code></p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 输入 sudo mkinitcpio -P 命令生成 initramfs</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo mkinitcpio -P</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><strong>重要：执行完命令之后重启电脑（一定要重启）</strong></p>
<blockquote><p>校验是否安装成功</p>
</blockquote><p>打开终端，输入 <code>nvidia-smi</code> 命令，出现 <code>NVIDIA-SMI has failed because it couldn't communicate with the NIVIDIA driver. Make sure that the latest NVIDIA driver is installed and running</code> ，那就说明没有安装成功。</p>
<p><strong>解决方案：重启电脑，如果重启电脑还是不行，看看上面修改的配置有没有对，如果还是不行在安装一遍</strong></p>
<h3 id="仅使用-nvidia-显卡" class="heading-element"><span>1.1、仅使用 NVIDIA 显卡</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bb%85%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8-nvidia-%e6%98%be%e5%8d%a1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><strong>下面配置针对于 x 服务器，并使用桌面环境（dwm）</strong></p>
<blockquote><p>创建 xorg.conf（10-nvidia-drm-outputclass.conf）</p>
</blockquote><p>在 <code>/etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/</code> 目录下新建 <code>10-nvidia-drm-outputclass.conf</code>。</p>
<p><strong>重要：如果<code>/etc/X11</code>存在<code>xorg.conf</code>，那么一定要删除掉</strong></p>
<p>在<code>/usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/10-nvidia-drm-outputclass.conf</code>也有一份是生成的，可以参考着来看</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/10-nvidia-drm-outputclass.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Section <span class="s2">&#34;OutputClass&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Identifier <span class="s2">&#34;intel&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> MatchDriver <span class="s2">&#34;i915&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Driver <span class="s2">&#34;modesetting&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">EndSection
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Section <span class="s2">&#34;OutputClass&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Identifier <span class="s2">&#34;nvidia&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> MatchDriver <span class="s2">&#34;nvidia-drm&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Driver <span class="s2">&#34;nvidia&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Option <span class="s2">&#34;AllowEmptyInitialConfiguration&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Option <span class="s2">&#34;PrimaryGPU&#34;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;yes&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> ModulePath <span class="s2">&#34;/usr/lib/nvidia/xorg&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> ModulePath <span class="s2">&#34;/usr/lib/xorg/modules&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">EndSection</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><strong>注意：</strong> 这里的 <code>intel</code> 驱动 <strong>必须为</strong> <code>modesetting</code>，否则会产生严重的撕裂，后面的 <code>AllowEmptyInitialConfiguration</code> 是为了让 n 卡在没检测到显示器的时候继续运行，而不是默认的退出。</p>
<blockquote><p>使用 startx 启动</p>
</blockquote><p>这里以<strong>dwm</strong>为例，如果你是其他桌面管理器，请参阅<a href="https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/NVIDIA_Optimus#Display_Managers"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">这里</a>。如果不配置你将会获得黑屏。</p>
<p>接下来，将以下两行添加到您的开头：<code>~/.xinitrc</code></p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl mask systemd-rfkill.socket</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>参考教程：https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/TLP</p>
<blockquote><p>GUI</p>
</blockquote><p>安装 ： <code>paru -S tlpui</code></p>

item.description:
<img src="https://roukaixin.github.io/posts/thumbnail/arch/arch-install-config.webp" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="配置中国源和开启32位软件包" class="heading-element"><span>1、配置中国源和开启32位软件包</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e4%b8%ad%e5%9b%bd%e6%ba%90%e5%92%8c%e5%bc%80%e5%90%af32%e4%bd%8d%e8%bd%af%e4%bb%b6%e5%8c%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote><p>配置中国镜像源</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑 /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist，如果在安装系统时，关闭了 reflector 服务和配置了 mirrorlist，那么这个可以不用改，为了保险起见，还是需要看一下和安装的时候有没有区别。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在头部添加中科大源</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">Server</span> <span class="o">=</span> https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinux/<span class="nv">$repo</span>/os/<span class="nv">$arch</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition info open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-info-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>提醒<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">还可以添加其他源，例如：清华源(Server = <a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch</a>)，阿里云（Server = <a href="https://mirrors.aliyun.com/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.aliyun.com/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch</a>）</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<blockquote><p>开启32位软件包</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑 /etc/pacman.conf </span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /etc/pacman.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下面两行内容取消掉 # 号</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>multilib<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">Include</span> <span class="o">=</span> /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>添加 aur 源</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在最后面添加</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>archlinuxcn<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">Server</span> <span class="o">=</span> https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/<span class="nv">$arch</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition info open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-info-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>提醒<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">其他 aur 源。清华源（Server = <a href="https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/$arch"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/archlinuxcn/$arch</a>），
阿里云源（Server = <a href="https://mirrors.aliyun.com/archlinuxcn/$arch"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://mirrors.aliyun.com/archlinuxcn/$arch</a>）</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<p><strong>必须执行以下命令以添加密钥签名</strong></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 更新软件包缓存</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pacman -Syy
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装 GPG key</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="添加一个普通用户" class="heading-element"><span>2、添加一个普通用户</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e4%b8%80%e4%b8%aa%e6%99%ae%e9%80%9a%e7%94%a8%e6%88%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#新建用户名arch 可自行更改用户名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">useradd -m -G wheel -s /bin/bash arch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#设置arch用户名的密码</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">passwd arch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#编辑arch用户的权限</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">EDITOR</span><span class="o">=</span>vim visudo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">找到 <span class="c1"># %wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL 并把 # 号去掉</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230625065238368</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png" alt="image-20230625065238368" srcset="assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png?size=small, assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/arch-install-config.assets/image-20230625065238368.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20230625065238368</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<div class="details admonition info open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-info-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>提醒<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p><strong>我自己个人是注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL</code> 这一行，方便之后使用 <code>sudo</code> 时不需要输入密码。</strong></p>
<p><strong>如果不想使用 <code>sudo</code> 命令时输入密码，可以注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL</code>。两个选择一个注释掉既可以了</strong></p>
</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h2 id="安装软件源aur" class="heading-element"><span>3、安装软件源（AUR）</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e8%bd%af%e4%bb%b6%e6%ba%90aur" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可以选择两个都安装，也可以只安装一个</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pacman -S yay paru</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="安装字体" class="heading-element"><span>4、安装字体</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e5%ad%97%e4%bd%93" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># ttf-dejavu : 英文字体</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># wqy-zenhei : 文泉驿正黑矢量字体</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># wqy-microhei : 文泉驿-微米黑</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># noto-fonts-emoji : Emoji 字体</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># ttf-jetbrains-mono-nerd :</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pacman -S ttf-dejavu wqy-zenhei wqy-microhei noto-fonts-emoji</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="安装中文输入法" class="heading-element"><span>5、安装中文输入法</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e4%b8%ad%e6%96%87%e8%be%93%e5%85%a5%e6%b3%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote><p>安装 fcitx5</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># fcitx5-chinese-addons ：中文输入法引擎</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># </span>

</div><blockquote><p>配置输入法</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1

</div><blockquote><p>安装词库</p>

item.author: a3427173515@163.com (不北咪)
item.description:
<img src="https://roukaixin.github.io/posts/thumbnail/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98/idea.webp" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="failed-to-retrieve-application-jmx-service-url-报错" class="heading-element"><span>1、<code>Failed to retrieve application JMX service URL</code> 报错</span>
 <a href="#failed-to-retrieve-application-jmx-service-url-%e6%8a%a5%e9%94%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>启动项目时候，消息中心中出现 <code>Failed to retrieve application JMX service URL</code> 错误信息。</p>
<p>解决方法: 把 <code>C:\Users\{用户名}\AppData\Roaming\JetBrains</code> 文件夹删除，之后重启 idea 即可</p>
<p><strong>注意: 如果没有看到上面的文件夹，请打开隐藏文件</strong></p>
<p>如果上面方法还是不能成功，那么就需要在启动参数中加入 <code>-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote</code></p>
<h2 id="fcitx5-在-idea-显示框位置不正确" class="heading-element"><span>2、fcitx5 在 idea 显示框位置不正确</span>
 <a href="#fcitx5-%e5%9c%a8-idea-%e6%98%be%e7%a4%ba%e6%a1%86%e4%bd%8d%e7%bd%ae%e4%b8%8d%e6%ad%a3%e7%a1%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>高版本 <code>idea</code> 不需要设置，默认已经解决</p>
<p>解决方法：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>ctrl + shel + a</code> 打开搜索 <code>actions</code>，搜索 <code>choose boot java runtime for the ide</code></li>
</ul>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20231217230832950</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png" alt="image-20231217230832950" srcset="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png?size=small, assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217230832950-17028257178791.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20231217230832950</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<ul>
<li>搜索后按下回车键打开它</li>
</ul>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20231217231143620</h2><p> </p>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png" alt="image-20231217231143620" srcset="assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png?size=small, assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/idea-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98.assets/image-20231217231143620-17028259070872.png?size=large 2x" data-title=" " style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">image-20231217231143620</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p> <strong>选择第一个即可，b后面的数字越大版本越新</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>现在之后安装重新 idea 即可</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="启动速度优化" class="heading-element"><span>3、启动速度优化</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e9%80%9f%e5%ba%a6%e4%bc%98%e5%8c%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>
<p>加入下面到 vm 配置中</p>
</li>
<li>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">-Xms128m
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-Xmx8192m
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize<span class="o">=</span>1024m
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:+UseG1GC
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:SoftRefLRUPolicyMSPerMB<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">50</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:CICompilerCount<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">-XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div></li>
</ol>
<p>参考 ： <code>https://blog.csdn.net/m0_58022371/article/details/136951465</code></p>

item.description:
<img src="https://roukaixin.github.io/posts/thumbnail/minio-%E9%9B%86%E7%BE%A4%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2/minio.webp" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><h2 id="集群部署" class="heading-element"><span>1、集群部署</span>
 <a href="#%e9%9b%86%e7%be%a4%e9%83%a8%e7%bd%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

<blockquote><p>docker compose 文件</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6

</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15

</span><span class="lnt">18

</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"></span><span class="nt">services</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">minio</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">image</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="l">minio/minio:RELEASE.2023-07-21T21-12-44Z</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">environment</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;MINIO_ROOT_USER=roukaixin&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=roukaixin&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">ports</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;9000:9000&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;9090:9090&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">volumes</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="l">./data/disk1/minio:/data/disk1/minio</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="l">./data/disk2/minio:/data/disk2/minio</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="l">./data/disk3/minio:/data/disk3/minio</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="l">./data/disk4/minio:/data/disk4/minio</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">command</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;server&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;http://minio{1...4}:9000/data/disk{1...4}/minio&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;--console-address&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;:9090&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">extra_hosts</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;minio1:10.1.1.1&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;minio2:10.1.1.2&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;minio3:10.1.1.3&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span>- <span class="s2">&#34;minio4:10.1.1.4&#34;</span><span class="w">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="w"> </span><span class="nt">network_mode</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="s2">&#34;host&#34;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><strong>注意：</strong></p>
<ol>
<li><code>minio</code> 版本需要一致</li>
<li><strong>{1&hellip;4}</strong> 表示的是一到四个节点。一到四之间是三个点。</li>
<li><strong>extra_hosts</strong> 表示在容器主机内中的 <code>/etc/hosts</code> 文件中添加。</li>
<li>一定需要使用 <code>host</code> 网络模式，如果不是 <code>host</code> 网络，那么启动就会报 <code>Unable to read 'format.json'</code> 错误</li>
</ol>

<p><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230714150218400</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png" alt="image-20230714150218400" srcset="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png?size=small, assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714150218400.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20230714150218400" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>

 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -i.bak <span class="se">\

</div><h3 id="创建一个普通用户" class="heading-element"><span>2.2、创建一个普通用户</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba%e4%b8%80%e4%b8%aa%e6%99%ae%e9%80%9a%e7%94%a8%e6%88%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#新建用户名arch 可自行更改用户名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">useradd -m -G wheel -s /bin/bash arch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#设置arch用户名的密码</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">passwd arch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">EDITOR</span><span class="o">=</span>vim visudo
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">找到 <span class="c1"># %wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL 并把 # 号去掉</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><strong>个人是注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL</code> 这一行，如果不想使用 <code>sudo</code> 命令时输入密码，可以注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL</code>。两个选择一个注释掉既可以了</strong></p>
<h3 id="配置窗口管理器" class="heading-element"><span>2.3、配置窗口管理器</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e7%aa%97%e5%8f%a3%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86%e5%99%a8" class="heading-mark">

 </a>
</h3><blockquote><p>xorg 服务器</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装依赖包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo dnf install xorg-x11-server-devel xorg-x11-xinit xorg-x11-server-Xorg
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 可选</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">xorg-x11-server-Xvfb xorg-x11-xauth xorg-x11-server-Xvfb xorg-x11-server-Xdmx xorg-x11-server-Xephyr xorg-x11-server-Xnest</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在家目录下新建 <code>.xinitrc</code> 文件，并加入下面内容</p>

</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span><span class="nb">exec</span> dwm</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><blockquote><p>dwm</p>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装依赖包</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.com/roukaixin/yaocccc-dwm
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译</span>

</div>
</div><p><strong>编译过程中，可能会缺失一些同文件，可以使用 <code>dnf provides */头文件名</code> 来查找在哪一个包</strong></p>
<blockquote><p>st</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 克隆 st</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://gitee.com/rouxin/st
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo make clean install</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>picom</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6

</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装依赖包</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo dnf install meson libev-devel xcb-util-renderutil-devel xcb-util-image-devel pixman-devel xcb-util-devel uthash-devel libconfig-devel mesa-libGL-devel dbus-devel
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 克隆pciom</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.com/FT-Labs/picom
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> picom
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule update --init --recursive
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">meson setup --buildtype<span class="o">=</span>release . build
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ninja -C build
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ninja -C build install</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote><p>其他工具包</p>
</blockquote><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo dnf install network-manager-applet flameshot dunst feh neofetch neovim acpi xsetroot</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>

<p><a class="lightgallery" href="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>image-20230714175135561</h2>"><img loading="lazy" src="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png" alt="image-20230714175135561" srcset="assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png?size=small, assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png?size=medium 1.5x, assets/fedora-linux.assets/image-20230714175135561.png?size=large 2x" data-title="image-20230714175135561" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a></p>

<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">

</h2><h3 id="创建一个普通用户" class="heading-element"><span>2.1、创建一个普通用户</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">useradd -m -G wheel -s /bin/bash arch

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">找到 <span class="c1"># %wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL 并把 # 号去掉</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><p><strong>个人是注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL)ALL</code> 这一行，如果不想使用 <code>sudo</code> 命令时输入密码，可以注释掉 <code>%wheel ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL</code>。两个选择一个注释掉既可以了</strong></p>
